interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Beuaty Star 3PCS Poly Nail Gel Kit 30ml, Extension Gel Trial Kit Nail Enhancement Builder Gel Professional Nail Gel All-in One with with Base Top Coat
Review Date: 2020/11/07
Store: Beauty Star
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Beauty Star', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Unit Count': '144.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.7 x 9.2 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
Review Text: The product took a bit of extra time to finally get to me. In general, together is a good set.  A couple of things annoyed me. First, the nails - the poly forms, were fine but the case they're in not numbered and the nail themselves are numbered but so tiny it's very hard to make out. Also, the container be VERY careful it doesn't close well if dropped with the way their numbered it was hard to put them back in their home slots. The poly gel- very very tacky, I get it supposed to be but it made it a bit messy from the tube to the spatula, to the nail. The company did warm about the gel in the turn and working with it in cooler temperatures.  In the few kits I've received from the Vine program it was the only one with a tool/brush so yay!! overall a good product and kit to use.
Review Title: good for beginners
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

The product took a bit of extra time to finally get to me. In general, together is a good set.  A couple of things annoyed me. The poly gel- very very tacky, I get it supposed to be but it made it a bit messy from the tube to the spatula, to the nail. The company did warm about the gel in the turn and working with it in cooler temperatures.  In the few kits I've received from the Vine program it was the only one with a tool/brush so yay!! overall a good product and kit to use.

profile:
### User Profile Summary

**Keywords:** Nail Enhancement, Gel Products, Beginner Friendly, Product Usability, Delivery Delays, Attention to Detail

**Preferences & Trends:**
- **Nail Care Focus:** The user is interested in nail enhancement products, particularly gel-based items, indicating an affinity for DIY nail art and care.
- **Beginner Orientation:** The review highlights the product as suitable for beginners, suggesting that the user may be either new to nail care or prefers products that are easy to work with.
- **Attention to Detail:** Complaints about product packaging—specifically, the lack of clear numbering and difficulty handling components—indicate a preference for well-organized and user-friendly designs.
- **Delivery Experience:** Concerns regarding delivery times suggest that the user values prompt service and reliability when purchasing products.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Despite some frustrations, the user’s overall impression is positive, indicating a tendency to appreciate practical functionality over minor inconveniences.

This profile outlines a user who enjoys engaging with nail care activities while seeking beginner-friendly and reliable products that minimize complexity and enhance the experience.
